committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A Resolution expressing to the President the sense of concern felt by the Senate on account of the present shortage of domestic cattle hides and concern for the effects of that shortage upon the shoe, tanning, cattle and related industries.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President take necessary steps to: (1) assure domestic tanners of adequate supplies of cattle hides; (2) enlarge export possibilities to Japan for shoes and tanned leather; and (3) maintain favorable export opportunities of hides for domestic cattle producers.

titles.title: A Resolution expressing to the President the sense of concern felt by the Senate on account of the present shortage of domestic cattle hides and concern for the effects of that shortage upon the shoe, tanning, cattle and related industries.
